citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on
5/7/2025. The inspector called the licensee who said nobody would be back until that evening. Failure to provide access
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection can be a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply
may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00pm on 
5/7/2025. The inspector called the licensee who said nobody would be back until that evening. Failure to provide access 
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection can be a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply 
may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
